monogr.title: Jesuiten und Inkulturationsbemühungen des Christentums in China: Die Abhandlung zur “Nestorianischen Stele” von Emanuel Diaz (1574–1659)

biblStruct.note: For the Jesuits, the discovery of the “Nestorian Stele” was a ray of hope in a long dark night. They immediately realised that this finding was of great value for the spread of Christianity in China. The treatise by Emmanuel Diaz SJ is considered the first and to this day the most renowned interpretation of the stele in Chinese and is at the same time an illuminating example of the Jesuits’ inculturation efforts. This book introduces the historical context of the Jesuit mission in China, presents for the first time a translation of Emmanuel Diaz’s work in a Western language (i.e. German) and offers a textual analysis primarily from a historiographical and linguistic perspective.
